message.content:
cs.CR, cs.AI, cs.LG, cs.SE, cs.IR 

The paper discusses the use of machine learning techniques to predict the exploitation of software vulnerabilities, which falls under the category of computer security (cs.CR). The paper also mentions the use of features derived from vulnerability databases and social media posts, which suggests the use of artificial intelligence (cs.AI) and machine learning (cs.LG) techniques. The paper also discusses the importance of software vendors providing patches and users installing them, which relates to software engineering (cs.SE). Finally, the paper discusses the selection of training and test data, which suggests the use of information retrieval (cs.IR) techniques.
